2025-03-02.note: Glass-off evening surf session. Clean 3-4ft sets at Topanga.

2025-03-05.note: Storm swell came in hard. Heavy currents but some barrels.

2025-03-11.note: Tide too high this morning. Did a beach run instead.

2025-03-15.note: Epic day at County Line. First time paddling out on a 6'6".

2025-03-18.note: Windy and blown out, stayed dry. Coffee and planning session.

2025-03-22.note: Dawn patrol was perfect. Long smooth lefts all morning.
